thread.section_title: Pod 39 Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Efficient and convenient mid town hotel
thread.title_full: Efficient and convenient mid town hotel - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Valerie K
title: Efficient and convenient mid town hotel
text:
I arrived late and had an issue with a noisy room . Something was making the entire room vibrate ! A Technicien came swiftly but the problem persisted I was immediately upgraded to a quieter room .
Great location near grand central station, friendly staff -especially Stevie and Romaine available for transport, tips on restaurants etc..- my only regret is that the hotel breakfast area doesn't serve real coffee but on the other hand the bar has half decent Margarita's!
